games.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
games.description: An open-world action RPG where players control Geralt of Rivia in search of his adopted daughter.

games.name: Cyberpunk 2077
games.description: A futuristic RPG set in a dystopian city filled with cybernetic enhancements and crime.

games.name: Minecraft
games.description: A sandbox game where players build, explore, and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated world.

games.name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.description: An action-adventure game where Link must explore Hyrule and defeat Calamity Ganon.

games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: An action-adventure game set in the late 1800s, where players take on the role of Arthur Morgan, an outlaw.

games.name: Overwatch
games.description: A team-based multiplayer FPS where players select from a variety of heroes, each with unique abilities.

games.name: Fortnite
games.description: A battle royale game where 100 players fight to be the last one standing on an ever-shrinking island.

games.name: Among Us
games.description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players work together to identify the imposter among the crew.

games.name: Hades
games.description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler where players control Zagreus, the son of Hades, in his attempt to escape the Underworld.

games.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
games.description: An open-world RPG set in the fantasy world of Tamriel, where players take on the role of the Dragonborn.
